text: [Music]
hi I'm Marcelo Williams inducer
microcontroller product manager at
Infineon Technologies Infineon do the
best in class power sensory
microcontroller and security devices in
the semiconductor industry our solution
for an Athenian works as a hub in the
local application connected to the AWS
system in the clouds with all these echo
system in your local application you are
able to collect all the data and send
this data through AWS to the cloud to be
manipulated and have the big data
available our customers have a very good
knowledge about the application but not
about how to connect the cloud so they
don't want to waste time on knowledge
how to connect their equipments to the
cloud but at the same time they had
pressure from their customers to connect
this product to the cloud on a very
feasible way in a very cost-effective
solution well real world application
it's a case of our customers that
manufacture air-conditioned they wants
to have a real time data on how the
machine is working and if there is a
broken part how they can make the
montains with Amazon freertos we can
have software running inside the
microcontroller and they can collect
this data in advance making sure that if
there is a broken part the technician
can go just one way with the right part
they can do the measurement of the
analytics data that came from this part
and they they can introduce a
traceability of the production so this
is really important because they can
even check the mtbf and they can check
if the supplier is delivering their
right parts to them with the solution
from AWS running locally our customers
are able to use the same hardware
application that are currently using
basil on cortex
zero and M for solution they can address
a broad range of applications not just
the high-end ones but the the low-end
and the median ones so they can add
connectivity with a very affordable
price and they can spread the big data
that they collected locally for all
product lines things from applications
automation lightning and olders Infineon
decided to use Amazon Web service
because it's the best fits to our
microcontroller portfolio besides the
fact that was the perfect match with our
cortex-m devices Amazon FreeRTOS is one
of the fastest adoption products in the
market with AWS solution infinity
delivery connectivity to our customers
in a very cost-effective manner
so then Infineon can focus on what we do
best
semiconductors counting on a partner as
AWS which has a strong expertise in
called solutions we can offer this
best-in-class solution to our customers
